Question: This person sent General Horace Sebastiani as envoy extraordinary, promising to help the Ottoman Empire recover lost territories.
Hints: Wellington, when asked who was the greatest general of the day, answered: "In this age, in past ages, in any age, this person.".
This person's own account was: "The most terrible of all my battles was the one before Moscow.
This person had a civil marriage with Joséphine de Beauharnais, without religious ceremony, on 9 March 1796.
